name: xp0

body.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(c0, emptycls), emptycls)
-| wceq(ccnv(cxp(emptycls, c0)), ccnv(emptycls))
-| wceq(ccnv(cxp(emptycls, c0)), cxp(c0, emptycls))
-| wceq(ccnv(emptycls), emptycls)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(c0, emptycls), emptycls)
-| wceq(ccnv(cxp(emptycls, c0)), ccnv(emptycls))
-| wceq(ccnv(cxp(emptycls, c0)), cxp(c0, emptycls))
-| wceq(ccnv(emptycls), emptycls)

body.origin:
|- wceq(ccnv(cxp(emptycls, c0)), ccnv(emptycls))
-| wceq(cxp(emptycls, c0), emptycls)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(c0, emptycls), emptycls)
-| wceq(ccnv(cxp(emptycls, c0)), cxp(c0, emptycls))
-| wceq(ccnv(emptycls), emptycls)
-| wceq(cxp(emptycls, c0), emptycls)

|- wceq(cxp(c0, emptycls), emptycls)
-| wceq(ccnv(cxp(emptycls, c0)), cxp(c0, emptycls))
-| wceq(ccnv(emptycls), emptycls)

comment: The Cartesian product with the empty set is empty. Part of Theorem 3.13(ii) of [Monk1] p. 37. (Contributed by NM, 12-Apr-2004.)
